snippet: Since earning its first N.C.A.A. tournament berth in 2009, Binghamton’s president, provost, two top athletic officials and the men’s basketball head coach have been replaced.
abstract: Binghamton University men's basketball team, which reached the NCAA tournament in 2009, is trying to clean up and rebuild a program that hit bottom after an academic scandal.
lead_paragraph: Since earning its first N.C.A.A. tournament berth in 2009, Binghamton’s president, provost, two top athletic officials and the men’s basketball head coach have been replaced.

headline.seo: After a Costly Scandal, Binghamton Begins Rebuilding
headline.main: After a Costly Scandal, Binghamton Begins Rebuilding

keywords.value: State University of New York at Binghamton
keywords.name: organizations
